wordpressPost.title: Vinn et møte med The Specials under Øya
wordpressPost.content:
Her er meldinga fra BlinkTV

Attention all Specials fans!
We are offering you the chance to meet the Specials at Oya festival this summer! Everyone with tickets to the festival can enter the competition to have a chance of meeting the band. But don’t worry, even if you’re not going to the festival you can still buy the live Specials DVD for an exclusive price of NKr 95.

To enter the competition click here
or to buy the DVD, click here

The deadline for competition entries is 6th August 2010

Reduced price of DVD valid until 20th September 2010
